thawath karyayan athara, athurudan wu pudgalayan sewima, owun ese athurudan wu wathawaranayan ha owunta ath wu iranama pahadili kirima; pudgalayan athurudanwime siddhin adu kirima pinisa adala baladharin wetha nirdesha idiripath kirima; athurudan wu pudgalayange ha owunge gnyathinge ayithiwasikam saha abhilashayan aaraksha kirima; saha ewani athurudan wu pudgalayanta saha owunge gnyathinta piliyam labaganima sandaha bhawitha kala haki yogya marga handuna ganima yana karyayan itu kirimata niyama wu shri lankawe athi nithya saha swadhina aayathanaya wanuye parlimenthu panathakin (2017 anka 09 darana panathen sanshodhanaya karanu labu 2016 anka 14 darana panatha)[1] pihituwanu laba athi athurudahan wu thanaththan pilibanda karyalayayi.

hambanthota, katuwana pradeshaye di athiwu wedi thabime siddhiya janatha wimukthi peramunema deparshawayak athara athiwuwak bawata sakakerena bawa jathika aarakshawa pilibanda madhya madhyasthanaye adhyaksha jenaral lakshman hulugalla mahatha pawasayi. siddhiyata sambandha sakakaruwan athadanguwata ganima sandaha polisiya ha hamudawa ekwa meheyum diyath karana bawa da ee mahatha sandahan kaleya. ada(15) paswaruwe pawathi janatha wimukthi peramune raswimakata ella wu wedi praharayakin kanthawak athulu dedeneku maranayata pathwa thawath pudgalayeku thuwala labiya. mema raswimata yathuru padiwalin pamini pirisak wisin mese wedi thabima sidukara athi bawa polis madhya prakashaka polis adhikari ajith rohana mahatha prakasha kaleya. kesewethath siya pakshaye palath sabha manthriwarayekuge pramukhathwayen pawathi raswimakata balahathkarayen kada wadunu aanduwe mara pirisak wisin mema wedi praharaya ella kala bawa ada derana kala wimasimaka di janatha wimukthi peramunu parlimenthu manthri anura kumara disanayaka mahatha sandahan kaleya.
mema sanskruthiya lankawata rediyo thakshanaye sankramanayath samaga nirayasayen baddha wiya.
